name: selfh-st-icons
description: selfh.st/icons is a collection of crisp, customizable SVG icons tailored for self-hosted dashboards. It provides consistent naming and theming, helping users visually organize services in tools like Homer, Dashy, or Heimdall.
features: Icon library: Curated collection of SVG icons for popular self-hosted applications.
Consistent design: Unified visual style across all icons for cohesive dashboards.
Multiple formats: Available as SVG, PNG, and WebP in various sizes.
Dashboard integration: Works seamlessly with Homer, Dashy, Heimdall, and other dashboard tools.
Custom colors: Easily recolor icons to match your theme using CSS or SVG properties.
High resolution: Crisp, scalable vector graphics that look sharp on any display.
Dark mode variants: Includes optimized versions for both light and dark themes.
Regular updates: New icons added frequently for emerging self-hosted applications.
CDN hosting: Fast delivery via CDN for quick loading in dashboards.
API access: Programmatically fetch icons by service name for dynamic dashboards.
Search functionality: Find icons quickly by service name or category.
Open source: Free to use and modify under permissive licensing.
